P1161 开灯

Written on December 29th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
bool used[10000001];
int main()
{
    double n,maxx=0,maxt=0;
		cin>>n;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
      double x,t;
      cin>>x>>t;
      if(maxx<x) maxx=x;
      if(maxt<t) maxt=t;
      for(int j=1;j<=t;j++)
      {
        if(used[int(j*x)]==1)
          used[int(j*x)]=0;
        else
          used[int(j*x)]=1;
      }
    }
    for(int i=1;i<=int(maxt*maxx);i++)
    {
      if(used[i]>0)
      {
				cout<<i;
				return 0;
			}
		}
    return 0;
}
Feel free to share!
